name: ElectronDB
tag_list: database, electron, electrondb, electron-db, oltp, ssd, migration, performance
overview:
Electron is an innovator of high performance OLTP database management system and has developed remarkably fast database technology for the 21st century using industry standard SQL.

Electron is a breakthrough enterprise-class SQL based ACID compliant OLTP database that offers explosive performance and unprecedented scalability beyond current industry standards. It is a transformative, remarkably fast database build for next generation hardware without the headaches and overheads of traditional RDBMSs.

Electron can simply the IT environment by removing several layers out of current IT Infrastructure.

The company is headquartered in Cleveland, OH with offices in Singapore and India.
